TextQuestions: How would you rate your guide's knowledge about the destination?
How engaging and entertaining was your guide during the tour?
Did your guide provide clear and informative explanations about the attractions?
How effectively did your guide communicate and interact with the group?
How well did your guide manage the timing and pacing of the tour?
Did your guide provide useful recommendations and tips for local experiences?
How would you rate the overall organization and logistics of the tour?
How satisfied were you with the itinerary and the places visited during the tour?
Did the tour meet your expectations in terms of the activities and attractions included?
How well did the tour provide a balance between guided activities and free time for exploration?
How would you rate the value for money of the tour?
How likely are you to recommend this tour to others?
How would you rate the level of engagement and participation of the tourist during the tour?
Did the tourist demonstrate a genuine interest in learning about the destination and its attractions?
Did the tourist display appropriate behavior and etiquette throughout the tour?
How well did the tourist interact with other members of the tour group?
Did the tourist ask relevant and thoughtful questions during the tour?
Did the tourist demonstrate patience and flexibility in dealing with unforeseen circumstances or changes to the itinerary?
